title: Urology Unit
subtitle: Best Urological Care in Dehradun
content: Our highly specialized urology department provides expert care for:
Kidney Stone Treatment – Minimally invasive PCNL, RIRS (Thulium Laser Surgery), and endourology.
Prostate Disorder Management – BPH, prostate cancer, TURP.
Bladder & Urological Cancer Treatment – Early detection, surgery, and personalized cancer therapy.
Male Infertility & Sexual Health – Treatment for erectile dysfunction, premature ejaculation, and urinary incontinence.

title: Oncology Unit
subtitle: Advanced Cancer Treatment in Dehradun
content: Our dedicated cancer care unit provides:
Cancer Screening & Early Diagnosis – Breast, lung, cervical, and prostate cancer detection.
Advanced Chemotherapy & Targeted Therapy – Latest treatments for improved patient outcomes.
Immunotherapy & Hormone Therapy – Cutting-edge solutions for breast, prostate, and lung cancers.
Palliative Care & Pain Management – Compassionate support for cancer patients, ensuring comfort and quality of life.
Cancer Surgery – Surgical removal of tumors, organ-specific cancer surgeries, and reconstructive procedures to improve survival and quality of life.

Immunization & Growth Monitoring – Essential vaccinations and development tracking.
Management of Childhood Asthma & Allergies – Personalized treatment plans for pediatric respiratory conditions.
Nutritional & Developmental Assessment – Ensuring optimal health and well-being for growing children.
